n0:runOracleScript.n0:source: prompt --application/shared_components/security/authentications/idcs_authentication_scheme begin -- Manifest -- AUTHENTICATION: IDCS Authentication Scheme -- Manifest End wwv_flow_api.component_begin ( p_version_yyyy_mm_dd=>'2020.10.01' ,p_release=>'20.2.0.00.20' ,p_default_workspace_id=>9748850854216151 ,p_default_application_id=>103 ,p_default_id_offset=>0 ,p_default_owner=>'DEMO' ); wwv_flow_api.create_authentication( p_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(20324801755405145) ,p_name=>'IDCS Authentication Scheme' ,p_scheme_type=>'NATIVE_SOCIAL' ,p_attribute_01=>wwv_flow_api.id(14209579635296066) ,p_attribute_02=>'OPENID_CONNECT' ,p_attribute_03=>'https://idcs-9c89ccdaea94463cb3816b66185d3831.identity.oraclecloud.com/.well-known/openid-configuration/' ,p_attribute_07=>'profile' ,p_attribute_09=>'sub' ,p_attribute_11=>'N' ,p_attribute_13=>'Y' ,p_invalid_session_type=>'LOGIN' ,p_logout_url=>'https://apex.oracle.com/en/' ,p_cookie_name=>'&WORKSPACE_COOKIE.' ,p_use_secure_cookie_yn=>'N' ,p_ras_mode=>0 ,p_reference_id=>20167393276402644 ); wwv_flow_api.component_end; end;
